title: ChatGPT maker offering $555,000 salary for ‘head of preparedness’ to head off threats to humanity from AI

title: Incoming Call: AI expected to be core selling point as smartphone makers look to stand out amid rising hardware costs
description: Smartphones in 2026 will focus on artificial intelligence as a key feature. On-device generative AI capabilities like summarisation and image creation will drive software differentiation. AI-capable phone shipments are expected to grow rapidly in India. Samsung will prioritize privacy and affordability of AI services. Consumers are aware of AI features but concerned about privacy.

title: How AI Rewired the Automotive World in 2025

title: Avengers Doomsday's Simu Liu Bats For Hollywood Extras Making A Living: Maybe Actors Shouldn't Be Making $20 Million
description: With AI (artificial intelligence) possibly coming for the jobs of extras in Hollywood, actor Simu Liu defended the background extras. He started out as an extra on Guillermo del Toro's Pacific Rim, where he learned how to behave on a movie set. The Marvel star also felt it was not a wise financial decision. , Hollywood, Times Now
